summary: A group of young martial artists infiltrate an underground pit fighting ring where the loser is chopped up and served in a Chinese restaurant.
cast: Laci J Mailey|Terry Chen|Alain Chanoine|Alyson Bath|Derek Gilroy|Bishop Brigante|Curtis Lum|Sebastian Gacki|David Milchard|Carrie Genzel|Johnson Phan|Anne Marie Corcuera|Doug Abrahams|Fraser Aitcheson|Kristy Dawn Dinsmore|Dean Wray|Mike Ching|Simon Chin|Barry Nerling|Henry Mah|Chris Casillan|Paul Cheng|Kelvin Lum|Michael Teigen|Nico Santini|Natasha Langmann|Wolf Dancshazi|Aleisha Langmann|Sean Kohnke|Edson T. Ribeiro|James Kot|John Shaw|Kat Ruston|Clare Dizon
title: Evil Feed
